page.title: 01Landscape,History,Art-Craft.
page.content: Our 4km by 3km area of land can be split into three broad areas - {(1).An area of mainly deciduous trees, {with a smaller area of introduced {conifers. } {(2).An area of mainly dairy farming {with smaller areas of market gardening {with three small reservoirs. {(3) A modern residential area with {the most expensive houses built in the {last 50 years. Many interesting people live in our area including the Lord Lieutenant of Dyfed and Mr.Adriano Candelori,a famous sculptor. We have seen a wild service tree in our area,which is one of the rarest trees in Britain.We have also found out many facts about two famous houses,a local brewery and old iron furnaces,as well as typical days in the lives of five children.
